request.description:
Use this collection for create category.  
  
**\--- field ---**

title: required

StartFragment

parents_cat_id: ( pass parents category id, id category has no parents category, pass null)

EndFragment

Use this for search category

StartFragment

{{base_url}}/category/search/**B**

EndFragment

This **B** is the **search value**(category title)

request.description:
**Use it for update category.**

##### \--field --

id: **required**

title, parents_cat_id : is **not required**, field. If need to update then pass value, or remove the property in api call time.

EndFragment

Use this for, disable / enable category

id: required field

Use this for delete category

id: required field
